description:
Flashback to the dark past of Rob Lucci as the young boy learns to dispense a cold, cruel, and brutal brand of justice. Back in real time, Luffy`s battle with Lucci threatens to destroy the navy fleet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senritsu no Kako! Yami no Seigi to Rob Lucci
Shivering Past! Dark Justice and Rob Lucci
Un terrible passé ! Rob Lucci et la justice des ténèbres
Жуткое прошлое! Чёрное правосудие и Роб Луччи
ماضٍ مُرعب! عدالة الظلام وروب لوتشي
戦慄の過去! 闇の正義とロブ・ルッチ
